long_description: This 4 oz., heavy, wet-style cycle lubricant stands up to the rigors of the trail for long lasting component protection. High viscosity synthetic formulation with special polymers provides maximum water resistance and protection from extreme pressure. Convenient "drip tip" allows you to apply just the right amount where you need it. Perfect choice for 100 mile plus rides, muddy off-road conditions, long rainy commutes, and foggy salt-air coastal climates.
short_description: This 4 oz., heavy, wet-style cycle lubricant stands up to the rigors of the trail for long lasting component protection.
